Let us leave behind sadness & regrets and have a new start full of joy in 2015!
Wish you a super-duper extra luck Happy New Year and all your dreams come true!
3, 2, 1, wait, what am I supposed to write afterwards? Oh yes, HAPPY NEW YEAR!
Wish you and your lovely family a very happy joyous New Year, my dear friend!
May Dec 31st be the end of sorrows and Jan 1st 2015 be the beginning of joys!
Wish you a Happy 2015 with hope that you’ll be super lucky in the year to come.
Counting my blessings, wishing you more. Hope you enjoy the New Year in store!
Wish all the negativity end with this year and 2015 brings success to you!
May God spread prosperity and joy in your life on this New Year!
Embrace simplicity and sincerity and you shall have a wonderful New Year ahead.

Privacy Lock helps you give your best wishes to your loved ones! Enter your friend’s number below and select a greeting, this greeting will be sent directly to him/her PLUS a free 10 Rs recharge as a gift!
Free 10 Rs recharge was sent to you via http://goo.gl/z6Th5N, check your message!
Join the New Year event and send your greetings to your friends, plus a free 10 Rs recharge as well as a big chance to win an iPhone6 for him/her!
Message fee will be charged by your telecom provider.
